articles.title: Ri Su Yong Meets Bangladeshi Party Delegation
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong Meets Bangladeshi Party Delegation
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Tuesday had a talk with the visiting delegation of the Bangladesh Jatiya Party led by Secretary General of its National Executive Council Mostafa Jamal Haider.

articles.title: Iranian Military Attache Gives Reception
articles.content:
Iranian Military Attache Gives Reception
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Bahram Ghanbari Chelarasi, military attache of the Iranian embassy here, hosted a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club Tuesday to mark the Day of Iranian Army.
					 Present there on invitation were Kang Sun Nam, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, generals and other officers of the Korean People's Army, officials concerned and representatives and military attaches of embassies of different countries. 
					
					 Ambassador Seyed Mohsen Emadi and staff members of the Iranian embassy were on hand.

articles.title: Moving to New Flats in Ryomyong Street Begins
articles.content:
Moving to New Flats in Ryomyong Street Begins
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Educators and researchers of Kim Il Sung University and those who had been evacuated began moving into new flats in Ryomyong Street on Monday.
					 Students congratulated teachers moving to new flats, presenting them with bouquets.
					
					 The teachers and researchers were full of thanks to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Those evacuees, too, hardly repressed their excitement at moving to new houses.

articles.title: Reception at DPRK Embassy in Russia Marks Day of Sun
articles.content:
Reception at DPRK Embassy in Russia Marks Day of Sun
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Embassy in Moscow hosted a reception on April 13 to mark the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					Invited to it were the chief of the Russia-DPRK Friendship Parliamentary Group of the State Duma who is secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, the chairperson of the Party for Peace and Unity, the head of the Orchestra of the 21st Century and other officials of political parties, the government and institutions of Russia.
					
					The charge d'affaires ad interim and officials of the DPRK embassy were on hand.
					
					The participants laid floral baskets and bouquets before an art work depicting President Kim Il Sung standing together with leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					They looked round photos showing the feats of the great leaders and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: Family Members from Abroad Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Family Members from Abroad Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Families of those related to the revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung from abroad visited Mangyongdae, his birthplace.
					 They went to the old home in Mangyongdae where the President was born and spent his childhood, nurturing his high ambition for the revolution. They looked round mementoes preserved there, being briefed on the history of the President, who devoted his all to the liberation of the country and happiness of its people, and his family members.

articles.title: Foreign Party Delegations Leave
articles.content:
Foreign Party Delegations Leave
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Workers' Party of Mexico led by National Leader Alberto Anaya Gutierrez and a delegation of the Islamic Coalition Party of Iran led by First Vice-General Secretary Seyed Mehdi Joulaee left here for home on Tuesday.

articles.title: IIJI Director-General and His Party Return
articles.content:
IIJI Director-General and His Party Return
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Ramon Jimenez Lopez, director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea (IIJI), and his party left here on Tuesday.

articles.title: Japanese Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Japanese Delegation Leaves
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The Kyoto delegation of Japan for celebrating the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung led by Tsutomu Yasui, vice-chairperson of the Japan-DPRK Friendship Kyoto Net for the Promotion of Cultural, Scientific and Civic Exchange, left here for home on Tuesday.

articles.title: Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Groups from Different Countries Leave
articles.content:
Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Groups from Different Countries Leave
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Delegations and delegates of Juche idea study organizations from different countries left here for home on Tuesday.
					 They included delegations of the Japanese Society for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in the Southern Region of Switzerland, the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand, a Pakistani delegation for the study of the Juche idea, a Turkish delegation for the study of independence, the chairman of the Group for the Study of Songun Policy Formed in Bandundu University of DR Congo and a delegate of the Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea.

articles.title: Anniversary of Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill Marked
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill marked the 70th anniversary of its founding.
					 The Mill is a site associated with the loving care for the people shown by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, and a light industrial production base which has carried forward the history and tradition of great surge of the Korean revolution.
					
					 Kim Il Sung visited the Mill on April 18, Juche 36 (1947) and gave teachings for it to follow.
					
					 Kim Jong Il provided guidance to the Mill several times since he visited it together with anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk and personally wrote the name of the Mill.
					
					 Workers, technicians and officials of the Mill have devotedly carried out the party's policy on light industry for the past seven decades and recorded its history with creation and feats.
					
					 A meeting to mark the anniversary was held on Monday.

articles.title: Results of Group I Matches of 2017 AFC Cup
articles.content:
Results of Group I Matches of 2017 AFC Cup
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The first match between the April 25 Team (DPRK) and the Kigwancha Team (DPRK), which belong to Group I of the 2017 AFC Cup, was held at the May Day Stadium in Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK, on Tuesday.
					 The match ended in a draw 1:1.
					
					 The second match between the two teams will take place at the Kim Il Sung Stadium in Pyongyang on May 3. 
					
					 Standings of Group I (tabulated under matches played, won, draw, lost, goals for, goals against, points):
					
					April 25 (DPRK): 2 1 1 0 7 1 4
					
					Kigwancha (DPRK): 2 1 1 0 4 1 4
					
					Erchim (Mongolia): 2 0 0 2 0 9 0

articles.title: 19th Kimilsungia Festival in Pyongyang
articles.content:
19th Kimilsungia Festival in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The 19th Kimilsungia Festival was opened at the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition here to mark the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (April 15) and many people visit the exhibition every day.
					 Tens of thousands of potted Kimilsungias, flower of the sun, were presented to the festival by more than 80 units including armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions, service personnel, citizens, school youth and children, overseas compatriots and foreigners.
					
					 According to Rim Yong Gum, head of an office of the Korea Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee, over 600 potted Kimilsungias were sent to the festival by organizations of overseas compatriots like the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, individual overseas Koreans and foreigners.
					
					 What draws attention of visitors is a stand decorated by Indonesia with some 100 potted Kimilsungias and a photo of President Kim Il Sung meeting former Indonesian President Sukarno in Bogor Botanical Garden.
					
					 Seen in the venue of the festival are potted Kimilsungias displayed on behalf of the president of the Syrian Arab Republic, the president of the Lao People's Democratic Republic and 30 foreign embassies and missions of international bodies here.
					
					 On display at the festival are also potted Kimilsungias sent by more than 50 friendship and solidarity organizations, including the Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK and the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association, individual foreigners and travel companies of different countries.

articles.title: 18,000 Industrial Art Designs Created in DPRK
articles.content:
18,000 Industrial Art Designs Created in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- A national industrial art exhibition is now going on in Pyongyang to celebrate the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The exhibition serves as an important occasion in promoting a radical development of the nation's industrial art.
					
					 When going round the State Industrial Art Exhibition House in April Juche 101 (2012), respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un called for creating more industrial art works reflecting the aspiration and desire of the popular masses.
					
					 Over the past five years, 18 000 industrial designs for over 400 objects were created by creators of the industrial art creation units, ministries and national institutions and teachers and students of different educational institutions.
					
					 Among them are those, which were personally examined by Kim Jong Un, like the facade decoration design of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, wreath-laying stand design of the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery and emblems of the Pyongyang Bag Factory and the Mindulle Notebook Factory.
					
					 On display at the exhibition are also designs and models of 5-ton truck, 80-horsepower tractor and other vehicles and foodstuff trademarks of the Changsong Foodstuff Factory, Pyongyang Corn Processing Factory and other factories.
					
					 In the past years, the Central Industrial Design Administration, the leading body in the field of the country's industrial art, have produced mark and tablet designs of public buildings in Samjiyon County of Ryanggang Province, signboard designs of public service facilities in Ryomyong Street and many other designs and made achievements in deliberating, registering and protecting designs.
					
					 The administration has registered many designs, including trademarks of the Pyongyang Hosiery Factory and the Wonsan Shoes Factory, at the World Intellectual Property Organization.
					
					 It has also revised or supplemented the law, rules and regulations on industrial design, trademark and advertisement design, while encouraging citizens to have a clear understanding of the intellectual property protection.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams U.S. for Reckless Act of Aggression
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams U.S. for Reckless Act of Aggression 
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Minju Joson Tuesday in a commentary cites facts to prove that the Trump administration of the U.S. schemes to settle the pending issues between the DPRK and the U.S. by force of arms.
					 It says:
					
					 Days ago we conducted the inaugural ceremony of Ryomyong Street amid great pleasure across the country and celebrated the Day of the Sun with splendor as significant holiday common to humankind.
					
					 However, the U.S. and south Korean puppet military warmongers frantically carried out the joint military exercises with dagger in their belt.
					
					 On April 10 the U.S. forces and south Korean puppet army conducted the largest logistic drill in the waters off Phohang of south Korea and a large-scale firing drill from April 13.
					
					 The DPRK has nothing to hesitate or think about something now when the U.S. reckless moves of aggression have entered the grave phase of practical implementation. 
					
					 We have absolute weaponry able to defeat at one stroke the enemies who are fond of playing with fire and trying to deprive the DPRK of its sovereignty, dignity and vital rights. 
					
					 Shortly ago the U.S. missile attack on Syria did not meet retaliatory counteraction. If they think the DPRK would be similar to Syria, it is a foolish calculation. 
					
					 It is needless to say that the military bases of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in south Korea and Pacific region and even the U.S. mainland can never be safe when the invincible revolutionary Paektusan army starts firing. 
					
					 The Trump administration should always remember that the U.S. is at the crossroads between the way to tomb of history by taking wrong option and the way to prolonging its remaining days even a little longer.

articles.title: Prosecution of S. Korea Keeps Park Geun Hye in Detention
articles.content:
Prosecution of S. Korea Keeps Park Geun Hye in Detention
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The south Korean prosecution Monday kept Park Geun Hye in detention on the charge of violation of 18 crimes such as bribery and abuse of position, according to the south Korean MBC.
					 The prosecution accused Park of receiving bribes totaling 43.3 billion won from Samsung Group on crimes on the basis of investigation into the extra-large scandal which was conducted from October last year. She also took tens of billions of funds from the foundation illegally founded by her close associates and plutocrats.

articles.title: S. Korean Bodies Hold Meeting for Peace against War
articles.content:
S. Korean Bodies Hold Meeting for Peace against War
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration, the People's Action for Peace against War, the Women's Solidarity and other organizations and inhabitants of south Korea held a meeting of world women's peace action against THAAD deployment and war in Seoul on April 15, according to the south Korean online paper Tongil News.
					 The participants in the meeting denounced the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet authorities for provocation driving the situation of the Korean peninsula to the brink of a war.
					
					 Saying that the tragedy of fratricidal war should be no longer allowed for posterity, they urged the "presidential" candidates to proactively work to remove the war crisis on the Korean peninsula and declare that any allies should never do such action that might impinge on the will and interests of the Korean nation.

articles.title: Photo Exhibition Sponsored by Chongryon to Mark Day of Sun
articles.content:
Photo Exhibition Sponsored by Chongryon to Mark Day of Sun
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- A photo exhibition of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) took place at the Korean Hall of Culture in Tokyo on April 15, the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 On display there were photos on the exploits the President performed by wisely leading the movement of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 Photos of leader Kim Jong Il who was together with the President on the road of the Juche revolution and photos of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un on the road of the Songun revolution were also on show.
					
					 Chairman Ho Jong Man and vice-chairpersons of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, and other officials of Chongryon, Koreans of various circles, youths and students in Japan looked round the exhibition venue.

articles.title: Bogor Botanical Garden Visited to Mark Day of Sun
articles.content:
Bogor Botanical Garden Visited to Mark Day of Sun
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- A ceremonial visit to the Bogor Botanical Garden in Indonesia was made on April 11 to mark the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, and the 52nd anniversary of the President and leader Kim Jong Il's visit to Indonesia and the 52nd anniversary of the birth of Kimilsungia.
					 Taking part in it were the vice-director and employees of the garden and the DPRK ambassador to Indonesia and embassy officials.
					
					 Noting he deemed it boundless honor to hold a significant ceremony at the garden on the occasion of the anniversary of the President's visit to Indonesia, the vice-director of the garden said:
					
					 It is our high pride that President Kim Il Sung toured our garden during his visit to Indonesia 52 years ago.
					
					 Kimilsungia, presented by President Sukarno to Kim Il Sung at that time, has kept blooming as a symbol of friendship between the peoples of the two countries.
					
					 We will as ever contribute to further boosting the friendly relations between the two countries by briskly conducting the work for widely disseminating the flower of the sun with the pride of working at the birthplace of Kimilsungia.
					
					 Being briefed on the exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for the development of the friendly relations between the two countries and on the immortal flower, the participants went round various places of the garden.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong se reune con delegacion del partido Bengali
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong se reune con delegacion del partido bengali
Pyongyang, 18 de abril (ACNC) -- Ri Su Yong, miembro del Buro Politico y vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, se reunio el dia 18 con la delegacion del Partido Jatiya de Bangladesh, encabezada por su secretario general del Consejo Ejecutivo Nacional, Mostafa Jamal Haider, de visita en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.

articles.title: Funcionario del MINREX se reune con editor de TF1 TV de Francia
articles.content:
Funcionario del MINREX se reune con editor de TF1 TV de Francia
Pyongyang, 18 de abril (ACNC) -- El titular de la Direccion 2 de Europa del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Son Gyong, se reunio el dia 17 con el editor de noticias exteriores de TF1 TV
					de Francia, Scott Michel, y le informo la posicion de la RPDC referente a la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Kim se refirio a que la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana llega al borde de guerra debido a Estados Unidos que vuelve a traer a las aguas maritimas de la Peninsula Coreana la flotilla del portaaviones nuclear justamente cuando libra los ejercicios militares conjuntos de mayor dimension de la historia movilizando numerosas propiedades estrategicas.
					
					Dio enfasis en la posicion de principios de la RPDC de defender con las fuerzas propias la paz y seguridad del pais haciendo frente rotundo a las acciones arbitrarias de EE.UU. y salvaguardar asi la paz y estabilidad del mundo.

articles.title: Ofrecido un banquete por Dia del Sol en embajada coreana en Rusia
articles.content:
Ofrecido un banquete por Dia del Sol en embajada coreana en Rusia
Pyongyang, 18 de abril (ACNC) -- La embajada de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en Rusia ofrecio el dia 13 un banquete con motivo del 105o aniversario del natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					Fueron invitados a la recepcion el secretario del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de la Federacion Rusa quien es el jefe del grupo parlamentario de amistad Rusia-Corea de la Duma Estatal de Rusia; el jefe de la Direccion 1 de Asia y el embajador itinerante, de la cancilleria rusa; la presidenta del Partido por la Paz y la Unidad de Rusia; el jefe de la Orquesta del Siglo 21 y los funcionarios de los partidos politicos, gobierno, entidades y organos, entre otros, el Partido Comunista de la Federacion Rusa, el Partido Democratico Liberal, el Partido por la Justicia de Rusia, el Partido Comunista de la Union Sovietica, la cancilleria rusa, la Compania Anonima "Ferrocarril de Rusia", la Asociacion Rusa de Amistad y Cooperacion Cultural con la RPDC y la Asociacion de Coreanos en Rusia (Unidad).
					
					Alli estuvieron presentes el encargado de negocios a. i y otros miembros de la embajada coreana en Rusia.
					
					Ante todo, los participantes rindieron tributo al Presidente Kim Il Sung y al Dirigente Kim Jong Il tras colocar un cesto y ramos de flores ante una obra de bellas artes en que los grandes lideres coreanos estan juntos.
					
					Luego, vieron las fotos alusivas a las proezas de los grandes Lideres y el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					
					En el banquete hubo discursos.

articles.title: Noticias del partido 25 de Abril - Kigwancha
articles.content:
Noticias del partido 25 de Abril - Kigwancha
Pyongyang, 18 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar hoy en el capitalino Estadio Primero de Mayo el primer juego entre el equipo coreano 25 de Abril y el otro Kigwancha, pertenecientes al grupo I (de la region de Asia Oriental) de la Copa de la Confederacion Asiatica de Futbol de 2017.
					El partido termino empatado por 1:1.
					
					El segundo partido 25 de Abril-Kigwancha esta programado para el 3 de mayo en el Estadio Kim Il Sung. 
					
					
					
					Clasificacion general:
					
					Equipo　　　　　　　　　PJ　JG　JE　JP　GF y GC　puntos
					
					25 de Abril (Corea)　　2　　1　　1　　0　　　7-1　　　　4
					
					Kigwancha (Corea)　　2　　1　　1　　0　　　4-1　　　　4
					
					Erchim (Mongolia)　　　2　　0　　0　　2　　　0-9　　　　0

articles.title: Fiscalia surcoreana acusa a Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Fiscalia surcoreana acusa a Park Geun-hye 
Pyongyang, 18 de abril (ACNC) -- De acuerdo con la radio surcoreana "MBC", la fiscalia del Sur de Corea acuso a Park Geun-hye bajo las 18 sospechas incluyendo el soborno y abuso del poder.
					A base de la investigacion sobre el inaudito escandalo que se desarrollaba desde el octubre del ano pasado, la fiscalia surcoreana entrego al tribunal los datos de los tremendos crimenes cometidos por Park, quien recibio 43 mil 300 millones de wones del Grupo Samsung y recogio mas de 10 mil millones de wones a traves de la fundacion establecida ilegalmente.
					
					Asi, la traidora Park, sometida en el juicio, espera la sentencia final manteniendo encarcelada en la prision de Seul.
